page.title: 20TRADE IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: There are few shops in this predominantly rural area. Shiptonthorpe possesses one general store and is regularly visited by mobile shops. There is a small weekly open air market every Friday in Market Weighton. Most of the shops flank the High Street. There are 4 banks, 2 supermarkets, 4 building societies, 2 fish and chip shops, a post office, launderette, shoe shop, blacksmiths, hardwear, haberdashery, DIY, wine merchants, newsagents, Chinese take-away, cafe, electrical goods, cycle shop, garage, camping shop, chemist, 2 butchers, estate agents, dentists, and opticians.
